modName: Player Draugr Eyes Quick n Cheap Fix
summary: Player Draugr Eyes Quick n Cheap Fix
descriptionHtml:
Player Draugr Eyes Quick n Cheap Fix batch files to quickly eliminate occasional Draugr Eye bug!!  Not at all sure what causes it but it can get annoying!!  I thought about how to add it in game (sans console) but couldn\'t wrap my head around it!!

Zip contains two files:  add.txt and gone.txt.  Drop both into your Skyrim folder.  NOT DATA FOLDER!!

When you notice your player character has Draugr Eyes merely bring up the console and type 

bat add  >>>>>>>>>  hit enter
              close console
             reopen console
               then type
bat gone >>>>>>>>> hit enter

close console, save game and VOILA!!!!  No more Draugr Eyes!!  Woohoo!!!!!!
author: GR00VYGH0ULIE

files.name: Player Draugr Eyes Quick n Cheap Fix
